comments.text: A website should be allowed to launch a link in an app tab Go for example
comments.raw_text: A website should be allowed to launch a link in an app tab Go for example
comments.author: antoine.mozilla@gmail.com
comments.creator: antoine.mozilla@gmail.com

comments.raw_text: This overrides the user's UI preferences, so shouldn't be available to sites by default...  Some sort of permission system would be ok, I guess.
comments.text: This overrides the user's UI preferences, so shouldn't be available to sites by default...  Some sort of permission system would be ok, I guess.
comments.author: bzbarsky@mit.edu
comments.creator: bzbarsky@mit.edu

comments.author: antoine.mozilla@gmail.com
comments.creator: antoine.mozilla@gmail.com
comments.raw_text: Clicking a link with target _apptab would propose a modal asking user if he wants to launch it in apptab and a checkbox to always remember for this URL.
comments.text: Clicking a link with target _apptab would propose a modal asking user if he wants to launch it in apptab and a checkbox to always remember for this URL.

comments.author: jstutte@mozilla.com
comments.creator: jstutte@mozilla.com
comments.text:
Bulk-downgrade of unassigned, untouched DOM/Storage bug's priority.

If you have reason to believe, this is wrong, please write a comment and ni :jstutte.
